resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107824</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107824</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207234</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The West</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Westen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Ouest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Oeste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Ovest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δύση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Oeste</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is an online companion to the 8-part PBS documentary. The site is divided into sections dealing with an overall tour, events in the West, places, people, and archives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein Onlinebegleiter zum 8-part PBS 
Dokumentarfilm. Die Site ist in die Kapitel unterteilt, die eine
gesamte Tour, Fälle im Westen, Plätze, Leute und Archive 
beschäftigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un compagnon en ligne au documentaire de 
8-part PBS. Le site est divisé en sections traitant une 
excursion globale, des événements dans l'ouest, des endroits, des 
personnes, et des archives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um companheiro em linha ao documentary de 
8-part PBS. O local é dividido nas seções que tratam de uma 
excursão total, dos eventos no oeste, dos lugares, dos povos, e dos 
arquivos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un compagno in linea al documentary di 8-part 
PBS. Il luogo è diviso nelle sezioni che si occupano di un giro
generale, degli eventi nell'ovest, dei posti, della gente e degli 
archivi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι σε απευθείας σύνδεση σύντροφος στο ντοκιμαντέρ 
8-μερών PBS. Η περιοχή διαιρείται σε τμήματα που 
εξετάζουν έναν γενικό γύρο, τα γεγονότα στη δύση, τις θέσεις, 
τους ανθρώπους, και τα αρχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">está un compañero en línea al documentary de 
8-part PBS. El sitio se divide en las secciones que tratan de un
viaje total, de acontecimientos en el oeste, de lugares, de la gente, 
y de archivos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207234</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107824</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-west</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
